about_the_game:
A group of friends, seeking adventure in their doldrum lives, get exactly what they crave,
when a man bursts through their local tavern door and collapses with a note and a strange utterance
on his dying breath.
Immerse yourself in a world of high fantasy and adventure as you lead this group from their small
village to distant shores of Umbrea and other lands in the world of Farmoor to find out what the
dying man's words meant.

  • Large world to explore
  • Non-linear adventure
  • Create your party from Human, Elf, Half-Elf, Dwarf, Half-Orc and the mysterious Khoth
  • Choose how your characters develop within their chosen class
  • Turn-based combat to give you time to plan
  • First-person party, free-roaming movement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad AMD 3.3 ghz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4GB video card recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-6800 3.4ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 8GB video card recommended

short_description: Create your party of adventurers and set out on a quest to free an old man's magically imprisoned son. Journey the lands of Farmoor in search of the four artifacts needed to reform The Eye of Baal. Not all that live in Farmoor sees this as a good thing.
